h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince
content: Sometimes, he’ll even rear back for a quick headbutt slam, but the move will usually stagger himself, and a quick dodge will give you a lot of time to lay into him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince'.
The content is as follows:
Sometimes, he’ll even rear back for a quick headbutt slam, but the move will usually stagger himself, and a quick dodge will give you a lot of time to lay into him.
